subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: Ferrari’s Felipe Massa scored his first points of the season by winning his second consecutive Bahrain Grand Prix, edging his teammate and the new overall Formula One leader Kimi Raikkonen by 3.339 seconds in Sakhir.
snippet: Ferrari’s Felipe Massa scored his first points of the season by winning his second consecutive Bahrain Grand Prix, edging his teammate and the new overall Formula One leader Kimi Raikkonen by 3.339 seconds in Sakhir.
